metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4549 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
QXmlSimpleReader in Qt before 5.2 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via an XML Entity Expansion (XEE) attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4549` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqt4-dbus - 4:4.8.4+dfsg-0ubuntu20
libqt4-declarative - 4:4.8.4+dfsg-0ubuntu20
libqt4-declarative-folderlistmodel - 4:4.8.4+dfsg-0ubuntu20

criterions.comment: qt4-x11 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:4.8.4+dfsg-0ubuntu20').
qtbase-opensource-src package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.0.2+dfsg1-7ubuntu13').
